reviewText: I stumbled across the 3.2.1. Penguin series when my grandson was 1 1/2. He has had so much fun with the videos, the hide & seek and the songs. He's almost 4 now & loves it just as much now as he did then. I think I have almost all of them but 1, maybe 2 & I can honestly say it was the best investment, video wise, I could have made. I will be so sad when he outgrows these.
